abstract: Ottawa Senators defeat Toronto Maple Leafs, 3-2; other hockey scores noted.
snippet: Colin Greening and Chris Neil scored power-play goals and the Ottawa Senators extended their winning streak to six with a 3-2 win over the Toronto Maple Leafs in Ottawa.
lead_paragraph: Colin Greening and Chris Neil scored power-play goals and the Ottawa Senators extended their winning streak to six with a 3-2 win over the Toronto Maple Leafs in Ottawa.
